Control Name: 3.6.4 You are using database replicas and data partitioning (sharding) as appropriate.
Control Statement: Database replicas and data partitioning can improve application performance by providing multiple copies of the data and/or reducing the taxation of database operations. Both mechanisms involve conversations and planning between developers and database administrators.
